Based on our discussion today, please provide a short (1-2 paragraph) description of a demand analysis topic in an area of interest to you. Your response should address the following questions:
    - What is the demanded good or service?
    - What factors affect the demand for your chosen good or service (e.g., price, quality, flavour, colour)?
    - Does your chosen good or service have an impact on the environment? If so, what are the impacts?
